A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved this movie. It's a different Star Wars movie. Dark and lightness isn't entirely clear at times as in previous movies. There are some incredible cliffhanger scenes. I was literally on the edge of my seat at times. I laughed alot and also was effected emotionally. You are going to read alot of negative reviews. I believe the reason is because this movie has an emotional effect on it's viewers. For many it might have been to much
